TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LogRecord extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示當做 COM+ 結構傳送的非結構化記錄檔資料錄。

span.span: Represents an unstructured log record delivered as a COM+ structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 非結構化的記錄檔記錄都會以 COM + 提供`CrmLogRecordRead`結構。Unstructured log records are delivered as a COM+ `CrmLogRecordRead` structure. 除了使用者資料 (單一 BLOB)，這包含適用於偵錯或錯誤尋找其他欄位。In addition to the user data (a single BLOB), this contains additional fields that are useful for debugging or fault finding. 欄位是位元欄位，提供關於此記錄在某個時間點，密碼遺失的詳細資訊和寫入時。The field is a bit field that provides further information about whether this record was forgotten at some point, and when it was written. 欄位提供的記錄檔記錄的序號。The field provides the sequence number of the log record. 在大部分情況下，序號是連續的但不一定連續由於不會傳遞到 Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) 補償器的內部的記錄檔記錄。In most cases, sequence numbers are sequential but are not necessarily contiguous due to internal log records that are not delivered to the Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) Compensator. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個類別。The following code example demonstrates the use of this class. [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_Crm#28](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/cpp/crmserver.cpp#28)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices_Crm#28](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/CS/crmserver.cs#28)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServices_Crm#28](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/VB/crmserver.vb#28)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Flags As LogRecordFlags

summary.span: 取得值，指出何時寫入記錄檔資料錄。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates when the log record was written.

value.span: 值的位元組合，提供關於這個資料錄何時寫入的資訊。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values which provides information about when this record was written.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Record As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Record { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得記錄檔資料錄使用者資料。

span.span: Gets the log record user data.

value.span: 包含使用者資料的單一 BLOB。

span.span: A single BLOB that contains the user data.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of this property. [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_Crm#28](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/cpp/crmserver.cpp#28)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices_Crm#28](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/CS/crmserver.cs#28)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServices_Crm#28](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/VB/crmserver.vb#28)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Sequence As Integer
public: property int Sequence { int get(); };

span.span: The sequence number of the log record.

value.span: 整數值，指定記錄檔資料錄的序號。

span.span: An integer value that specifies the sequence number of the log record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序號不一定連續由於內部的記錄檔記錄或這不會傳遞到 Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) 補償器遺失的記錄檔記錄。Sequence numbers are not necessarily contiguous due to internal log records or forgotten log records which are not delivered to the Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) Compensator.
